website_summaries.verdict: Add a burst of volume to your lashes with this quality waterproof mascara.
pros: Adds noticeable volume to even the thinnest lashes with just one coat
Applicator brush keeps lashes separated and clump free
Won't smudge when sweaty or wet
cons: Difficult to remove, you will need a quality waterproof makeup remover

customer_reviews.title: L'Oreal, can you fix one thing PLEASE?? Otherwise this stuff is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is just 2 coats. It's amazing. It's so easy to put on and the brush is great. BUT, L'Oreal needs to figure out a formula to make their product last longer. Literally within a few uses the mascara starts to dry up and gets flakey. It actually becomes uncomfortable by the end of the work day. I found this to be true with the Lash Paradise as well. PLEASE fix!!
customer_reviews.author: JillianG.

customer_reviews.title: Racoon eyes by 10 AM
customer_reviews.text: By the middle of the day, I look like a racoon. I don't put anything other than regular eye moisturizer under my eyes, so I don't think that's the problem. I've used the same moisturizer for years and is never been a problem with other formulas.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: honest review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Voluminous Million Lashes, Blackest Black(waterproof) mascara. It works beautifully after 2 coats, so far so good. this is my first day using this mascara and I love it! , definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melonie

customer_reviews.title: This 12ish dollar combo works better than 32 dollar upscale products lines in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Based on a you tube video of a makeup artist, I combine this with Cover Girl Lash Blast. The L'Oréal goes on first. Then I apply the Lash Blast on top using the wand to push up and curl the lashes. This 12ish dollar combo works better than 32 dollar upscale products lines in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: T. Neubert

customer_reviews.title: Not L'Oreal
customer_reviews.text: This is not a L'Oreal product. I have purchased the real Voluminous Million mascara through the store and this is not it. I would like a 100% money back return (I will mail back the mascara if needed). I am very sensitive to certain product and this mascara burned my eyes and caused them to become very watery!!!! The package was opened when received and it seemed like someone re-glued and package back together (since there was a good amount of glue on the package and it did look tampered with). Product ingredients isn't even listed on the back of the mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Dionne

customer_reviews.title: Definitely counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The pic with the wording going all the way to the cap is the original product. My product doesn’t match, the photo on Amazon or any other products on L’oreal’s Website. It’s awful, clumps, smudges, flakes and weighs down my lashes so the don’t stay curled. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: EASIER THAN FALSE EYELASHES!
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking of using false eyelashes but this did the trick without all that mess and difficulty. Once you put on this product and catch all of the smaller eyelashes, you will see your eyes "change" before you. They lashes add depth and color and intrigue. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Norwegiandogmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this! It has a nice wand, it's not a horrible smell. It goes on well. I felt like the applicator was a bit flimsy but that's probably so you don't clump up the mascara as you're putting it on. This looks very nice, I don't have great lashes naturally but they are what I would say normal. I'm a 40 year old female. I only applied once in a 8 hour time frame. You may want to apply more if you're the type of person that continually checks their makeup, I am a light makeup user so one use per 8 hours worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: TamBerine:

customer_reviews.title: Flakes horribly
customer_reviews.text: So two of my friends adore this mascara and I bought it on their recommendation. I was not impressed at all. I'm wondering if this is old product because after a few hours, it starts to flake everywhere and it looks like I never applied any at all! The color isn't amazing and I saw no great improvement over any other mascara, so wondering what is wrong. Maybe buying directly from the drugstore would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Good compromise for low toxicity
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a mission to switch all my cosmetics to products that score a 1 or 2 on the Skin Deep Safe Cosmetics database. This mascara is a 3 because of allergens but a 1 for toxicity, meaning it is a safe product. I originally tried Honeybee Gardens mascara and liked it, but it was so natural it looked like it almost wasn't there: good for every day but not as good if I want to get dressed up and go out. This mascara is a good compromise for me. I am not allergic to the ingredients, it is a low toxicity product, but gives me BIG lashes just like I hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the FIRST mascara that I've found that does what it says! I have very thin and short lashes and this mascara is amazingly easy to apply, lengthens my lashes and looks GREAT! (I'm 64, so I've tried a lot of mascara.)
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Scoumperdis

customer_reviews.title: The Only Mascara You'll Ever Need
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for over 10 yrs and I'm never disappointed. This particular million lashes one gives your lashes so much volume and length with no clumping. Friendly with the eyes as well. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Jinelle

customer_reviews.title: waterproof yes, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the waterproof version. I am a die hard L'oreal mascara fan, they hands down make the best washable mascara, that beats brands that are double or more in price. However, I have never found the same satisfaction with their waterproof versions. I find that the waterproof versions seem very dry, and they don't lengthen and fatten my lashes the way that the washable versions do. The mascara IS totally waterproof and I can wear it to a water park with the kids and it doesn't flake or run, so they do get the job done. I just wish I could find a waterproof that makes my lashes as lush and full as the washable version.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT give volume to the lashes
customer_reviews.text: I always wear waterproof mascara because it stays on and also, it gives me more volume. So I thought Million Lashes would be perfect - it isn't. Million Lashes gives me length, separates the lashes nicely, but doesn't add volume. I get more volume from my Loreal Voluminous. I have to use the Million Lashes first, then apply the Voluminous in order to have any volume. The brush is kind of odd also, it separates the lashes but because it is hard plastic it's difficult to work with, also is impossible on the lower lashes. I like a lot of things about this mascara, the formula just needs to give more volume. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Little Red Haired Girl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leave me looking like a raccoon
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't have the best luck with mascara.. it either clumps, flakes, or leaves me looking like a raccoon, but not this one. This picture was taken after 10 hours of wear and I only did 1.5ish coats. I'm sure you could layer it for more volume/length but for me that always results in spider lashes so I didn't try it. Outer packaging looked legit so I wouldn't worry about it being fake, the tube itself looks a little different than the product picture but they could have just changed it without bothering to update it here. All in all, I think its a great mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I usually use the other product, Voluminous, which I have loved for years, so I decided to try this one with it's finer brush. I used it over the primer that they make and was thoroughly impressed. It does have a strong alcohol smell but it didn't irritate my eyes, even when I poked myself in the eye with it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Kohlman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This alone gives me really long lashes. I just wish the tube was labeled with the brand. It also doesn't start running down my face when I'm in rain. But it's really easy to remove with a warm, damp, lightly soapy cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Talmia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Waterproof Mascara for the Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw a make-up blogger who recommended this mascara as an alternative to the very expensive ‘4D Mascara’ being sold via MLM reps. Everything she said about this product was spot on. It distributed evenly on my lashes, never leaves big, gloppy deposits & defines each lash. I buy the waterproof & I find it comes on relatively easy. I do not have trouble with flaking. I’ve bought the expensive $25+ 4D mascara, and in my opinion this tube of $7 mascara does just as good of a job and costs less on Amazon than I can even buy it at the local Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing I'll reach for
customer_reviews.text: Very middle of the road mascara. Leans slightly dry formula wise but will still smudge all over if you blink shortly after applying. For my normal volume/length middle aged lashes this delivera nothing of note in the volume or length department. Maybelline plush does better for my dollar if I'm going drugstore. After all the hype for the voluminous line this was a bit of a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Separates, Lengthens, & Buildable
customer_reviews.text: L’Oréal really did an amazing job with this mascara it definitely lengthens and separates. You can put a few coats on to really build it up for a thicker lash look. I’ve used so many high end and drug store mascaras it’s ridiculous but this is staple in my makeup routine.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Thick, dark, beautiful lashes!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It give thick, full lashes, goes on without clumping and stays put (no smudging) until I remove it at the end of the day. It's definitely waterproof, so removal with simple soap and water doesn't work (hey, we can't have everything, ladies). You're going to want some sort of makeup remover, or you'll be scrubbing your skin off (do waterproof and easy-to-remove-with-soap-and-water mascara go hand-in-hand in any product? I haven't found one yet. Maybe somebody out there knows of one...). Anyway, this product delivers the beautiful lashes you want without the drunken rock star look at the end of the day. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mascara - Great Length and Doesn't Melt!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to mascara. I live in Southern Cali, so I'm constantly having an issue with those little black spots above my eyes from my mascaras melting. I've never had this issue with this mascara. It stays on all day. Builds length really well (I have short thin lashes) and fills them out really nicely. It's one of those products for me I'm going to freak out about if they ever discontinue!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: Waited a few weeks to open this, when I did it was only the stick and not the brush. Whole thing went in the garbage. What a waste. If I receive a replacement I will edit this.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: not that volumizing
customer_reviews.text: this mascara seems to apply light amount of mascara. I feel like after applying you can barely tell I have mascara on. I have short straight eyelashes and use an eyelash curler. I typically lean towards volumizing mascara which is why I bought this but it applies a small amount of mascara. not my first pick if I want mascara for a night out
customer_reviews.author: jim f.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this mascara but was very disappointed. The only thing I halfway liked was the length it gave but by the time I was done putting on the 2nd coat it started to clump up. I thought the color would be a rich black but instead it is a very dull black, almost grayish. Made the curl I put in my lashes before hand fall and I ended up with flat, droopy, longish, clumpy eyelashes :(
customer_reviews.author: Erica Christian

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Mascaras I Have Used for My Skimpy Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have short skimpy lashes, but this mascara helps to lengthen and fill them in. This product was recommended by a friend, and I am happy with it, too. It is a very reasonable price. It washes off easily. It does not flake off during the day to leave little mascara bits on my face. I have this as an Amazon subscription order for every month. I am pretty ready for the new tube by the end of the month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds an extreme curl
customer_reviews.text: Wowowowowowow! This mascara really holds a curl! I have been using non-waterproof mascaras for the past few years but have recently been having eye allergies so they were smudging and flaking with my itchy watery eyes. I have used the non-waterproof version of this mascara and remember liking it, but this is much better! No flaking, no smudging, and the curl hold is unbelievable. My lashes have a natural upward curl but with an eyelash curler they fold straight up and touch my eyebrows! It's not any harder to remove than my non-waterproof mascara with my oil cleanser (Tonymoly brightening cleansing oil) as part of my double cleanse. No need to rub abrasively and damage your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My lashes aren't thick or "showy". I've used the mascara daily now and it lengthens & thickens my lases. It also washes off easily. Huge plus for those of us gals who don't wish to scrub our eyes roughly with wash cloths that would cause damage & wrinkles to our skin.
customer_reviews.author: Drindi

customer_reviews.title: smells unpleasant, but looks great
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is the plastic kind ...not a brush. I have to say, my key observation with this mascara is that it smells. I do not like the smell at all...it even makes me feel kinda sick, but the smell goes away very quickly as it dries. Otherwise, great product...and I'm super picky about mascara...I have light blond eyelashes, so it's important to me.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dawson

customer_reviews.title: No clumping
customer_reviews.text: I don't use mascara everyday due to my allergies but if I could I would definitely use this. The wand is great and I'm able to apply it without getting clumps like other mascara. It doesn't irritate my eyes and since it's voluminous I only have to use a little to make my lashes longer which is also a plus. It does, at times, smudge under my eyes but not too much. Would defintely try other L'Oreal mascaras again.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Flakey
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the reviews but after using it for a couple of months I've decided that I'll need to find a better produce. Only a few hours after applying the mascara I find that it easily flakes off and I have to keep checking the mirror to make sure it's not all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara. I tend to drift away and try out different hyped up mascaras but i always come back to this one. The wand is silicon which in my opinion is way better at preventing clumps and easier to build up layers. This will last me a a month to a month and half using it everyday two coats each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ari Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Flakes all day
customer_reviews.text: Mascara flakes. By the end of the day you have more mascara below your eyes than on your lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great mascara
customer_reviews.text: I never wear makeup & still don’t but I figured as I age, needed a kick, always wanted lashes but I don’t want anything on my body that does not belong to me so this was the best option. So I have been using this, second purchase & it is great. Volume, yes, easy to apply - yes. Will purchase again. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not create voluminous lashes
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the wand. It’s too bushy to apply mascara to entire lash from innner to outer corners. The mascara itself doesn’t add any addition volume to existing lashes. It doesn’t do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Decent mascara, but dries up quickly
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to this mascara after my favorite style from L’Oréal was discontinued. It goes on easily and definitely lengthens my lashes. However, I’ve found that it clumps easily if you’re not careful with the application. The tube also seems to dry out super quickly - I never get more than a month out of it. Overall a decent mascara for the price.
customer_reviews.author: MarinaLea

customer_reviews.title: Clumpy
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is so clumpy even with the first application. The fall out is terrible, during the makeup applying and during the day. Yes I tried wiping the wand so there would be less product. But for it to reach the non-clumpy level, there was hardly anything on my lashes and I would need 2nd coat. I don't think I should have to do that. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Gives volume and lashes are nice and separated! & with a double coat, it makes them look longer!. I love this version instead of the waterproof because this one is way easier to remove so it’s less stress on my lashes and it also lasts the day, but since my skin is a oilier than most it starts to flake by the time I’m home ready to take it off but other than that it’s a perfect everyday mascara for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Marshall

customer_reviews.title: WOW Factor!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. I am a red head with a pale complexion and light eyelashes. I use a base before using this mascara. My eye lashes are huge with the base and mascara and it looks amazing. I use 2 - 3 coats of the mascara; it builds very nicely. It will definitely give you that WOW factor. At night I take it off with coconut oil; removes easily with coconut oil. I have tried many, many, many mascaras. No raccoon eyes with this mascara. Stop looking and try this mascara. Would definitely recommend; I don't buy anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Annette M. Hughart

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: The looks of this just screams counterfeit. The tube itself doesnt even show that its loreal at all. The words dont match up to the originals....and it really kind of smells weird. I'm not going through the hassle to return it because it was cheap, but I'm kinda mad that I'm out of a mascara now.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Williams

customer_reviews.title: Used to like it but seems more flaky than usual
customer_reviews.text: This is usually my go-to waterproof mascara that I get at CVS but since I’ve been in quarantine, it’s easier to have it shipped with prime. I’m not sure if the formula changed or I accidentally left the package outside for too long after it was delivered, but it seems dryer and is flaking more than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Buys Alot

customer_reviews.title: Didn't do much for my sparse lashes
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try this based on the great rating. It didn't do much for my sparse lashes though. If applied alone, my lashes looked darker but not longer or thicker. I layer this on top of another mascara, or primer, and it still doesn't seem to do much. Now I'm just trying to use it up. It may be perfect for someone not looking to add a lot of drama, but I need a little more to complement my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Bob

customer_reviews.title: Allergy issue oops
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I'm giving such a low review was due to my allergic reaction I had to it. I tend to be allergic to most drug store branded make ups and sadly this one is now on that list. But if you dont have sensitive skin like I do. Get this for sure!!! Its nicely priced and made my lashes look amazing. Not waterproof but it did the job I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danyel Owen

customer_reviews.title: Spider Leg City
customer_reviews.text: If you like the spider leg look than this is the right mascara for you, otherwise I do not recommend. It gives you decent length, decent volume, and I cannot comment on its curling ability since I naturally have curled lashes. It will give you a spider leg lash look and personally I prefer a fluffy semi natural look so it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Janai

customer_reviews.title: Natural, Beautiful, Easy to Remove.
customer_reviews.text: I've been swearin by this mascara since 'nam. - It never flakes off, lasts literally all day - Gives tons of volume without clumping - very natural look but can be layered for a more extreme look - Easily removes with warm water - Applicator gets into corners easily
customer_reviews.author: kday

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. It goes on easy and does everything it says it will do. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ida M. Eardley

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it leaves the eyelashes! perfectly black and smooth... its the best mascara i have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Great Price & Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush on this and it's long lasting. I don't use waterproof because I lose my lashes if I do, (even with make up remover, my real lashes just fall out!) This stays on long but is also easy to remove at the end of the day. All in all, the quality for the price is a great deal and there's definitely a good chance I'll reorder this same product again. This was my second time ordering it
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly well!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara! I've used it for a few years now. Clump free. True volume & it adds length. I've tried several other promising brands, including different L'oreal mascaras and have yet to find one that beats this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount every application
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about this mascara is the way the brush gets the excess mascara off when you pull it out of the tube. No clumps or crazy amounts of mascara getting globbed on my lashes, looking all crazy! I will order this again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't smudge with oily skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mascara I have tried that didn't smudge all over my oily eyelids by the end of the day. I have even worked out in it and 90 percent of it stayed in place. It is not as volumizing as their non-tubing varieties but given its staying power this is my new daily use mascara.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to makeup bag
customer_reviews.text: It goes on smooth and separates my lashes. No issues applying it. I like that the bottle has a mechanism that takes off the excess mascara gel. So it’s not much on each pass. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Goor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good overall mascara for the price. It is not as dramatic as the description would have you hoping, but it does a decent job lengthening without clumping.
customer_reviews.author: Mom's World

customer_reviews.title: put a layer of regular under waterproof, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: put a layer of regular under waterproof, and it stays on all day and comes off way easier at night. Makes my lashes look long and full
customer_reviews.author: JoMac

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my lashes. Maybe my bottle was dried up or empty. I cannot even return. I’ve used L’Oreal Paris Makeup Voluminous Original Volume Building Waterproof Mascara, Black, 0.28 fl. oz.for years. I’ll be going back to that product. Why mess with a good thing?
customer_reviews.author: JEK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mascara
customer_reviews.text: I am a contact wearer and there is no irritation at all. It stays on all day with no smudges. tI goes on nicely but does get a little clumpy. It has been my mascara for years and will continue to be my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Mags514

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for volume/Length
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy "drug store" makeup/mascara (I've always worn Clinique)... But I was out of mascara, and wanted to try something new. After doing some research, this mascara fit the bill. I'm super happy I tried it, and will continue to purchase. The Volume/Length is incredible! a MUST buy!
customer_reviews.author: AME728

customer_reviews.title: Flake!
customer_reviews.text: Flakes. Flakes. Flakes. All day long. The flakes get into my eye, stick to my glasses, and make me look like a cross between Alice Cooper and Tammy Faye Bakker. Waste of money, unless you’re into the phenomenon called "eye black." (Google it).
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Riera

customer_reviews.title: Not for you if you curl your lashes
customer_reviews.text: I curl my eyelashes and this mascara seems to take the curl out of your lashes. Its weird. I like the way it goes on. I dont even mind the plastic bristle brush, which I normally hate. Will i buy again probably not. I like the curl. It does go on nice. My sister really likes it but she was born with long lashes that she doesn't have to curl. Lucky her.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Can wear off a bit, so suggest a clear coat of mascara over. That said, L’Oréal has the best mascara products on the market, high-end brands included. Best volume, definition, color pigmentation of any cosmetics line. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Melchor

customer_reviews.title: sensitive eye friendly
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I always come back to it. It doesn't clump on me, however, I do scrape off excess product. My eyes are sensitive and like to water another, my mascara stays in place and causes no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Dent

customer_reviews.title: No volume at all
customer_reviews.text: I was very much looking forward to having a mascara that would go on quickly and produce volume and length. Instead, as a brand new tube, it seemed like I was using a tube of mascara that had been in my makeup drawer for a long time, barely anything would be applied to my lashes and no volume to even dream about. I threw it away after two uses. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Backup

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: It is a pretty good mascara but it’s definitely not smudge proof. It is easy to remove but doesn’t give great volume. It only lasted me about 3 weeks. The tube runs out of product very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: Easy handling..
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this mascara often. It's the only one that does what I want it to. Goes on easily, no clumping and is easy to remove. Will continue using. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: FEISTY

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality - Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: I had used a very expensive ($27.99 per tube) Lancome Mascara for many many years. I tried L'Oreal volumizing, defining, smudge-proof Mascara which costs about about $8.00 per tube and found it to be an excellent extremely well-priced product that easily replaced the also excellent Lancome Product. But why pay the extra when L'Oreal has created a great product for a fraction of the price. I am very pleased and continue to order this L'Oreal Mascara from Amazon year after year. GREAT PRODUCT! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: California Sees Candy Lover

customer_reviews.title: No Smudge and Clean Looking Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a mascara that does not clump, no smudge, gives volume and gives my lashes a clean look! This mascara does all mentioned and is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Turcios

customer_reviews.title: Love Voluminous’s mascaras!❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara, I have their waterproof butterfly mascara and it is my favorite waterproof mascara I have ever used, I can’t wait until summer to use it more. As for this one it is amazing! It looks flawless unless you get water on it, (which is absolutely fine because it’s not supposed to be waterproof) it looks beautiful on my lashes, separates them very well, and gives my lashes a nice shape. Highly recommend this mascara 😉❤️
customer_reviews.author: Lisha M.

customer_reviews.title: Clumps, but if you work quickly it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thick, so if you try to use it several times when applying it it starts to look clumpy. Overall, the brush is a nice applicator, it is just the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara I've tried for a looooong time. Definitely purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Dessy Kismet

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and dries quickly.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchase this mascara and it looks great. No clumping, dries very quickly and you don’t feel like you over applied the mascara. Feels light and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: anabel less

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in "used" condition
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the Amazon box the smell of overly sweet room freshener wafted out. The packaging had obviously been re-sealed with a glue that also secured the tube of mascara to the cardboard. The wand was not tightly screwed on and was dried out when I looked at it. I did not feel safe to use that anywhere near my eyes. I threw it out and chalked it up to experience..... no make-up that I can't inspect at purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Croft

customer_reviews.title: Description is deceiving and disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This mascara did not live up to its description. I had to make multiple swipes on each eye to even get a good base. It is very sticky on my lashes so they did not separate easily or add volume. I have natural long lashes and this did nothing for me. It’s also flaky and I can’t rate what it’s like to remove it since I haven’t washed it off yet. I’ll definitely be going back to my Too Faced Mascara.
customer_reviews.author: swarfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. After application
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. After application, the mascara made my lashes full and thick looking!!! One of the best I have ever used. No need to add false eyelashes as it appears to make the lashes fuller and thicker!!! Impressive outcome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Cat

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. L’Oreal makes good products. Can’t really give 5-stars to mascaras as none of them operates quite as smoothly as I am forever hoping. It this is one if the better ones for sure.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Buy this only if you want to have to put 20 coats on your eyelashes. Comparable to a mascara you could buy at dollar tree & took forever for me to get it off. No volume or thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Keturah

customer_reviews.title: Changed the bristle!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the bristle on these. I used to love the older bristles, so much volume. This one is the stiff and plastic bristle that doesn’t do anything for volume or length. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Shananigans

customer_reviews.title: All dried up and worthless
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this mascara for several years and usually love it. The tube I got this time was all dried up and doesn’t work at all. It must have been really old stock!
customer_reviews.author: MajorB

customer_reviews.title: I like this mascara
customer_reviews.text: I like this mascara..it does flake a tiny bit when applying but it looks great after it's all done and put on.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It’s not to bad but you’re better off going to a store to get mascara this was super chunky I could barley put it on I ended up having to get a different mascara and I just use the brush from this one, he brush is great the makeup though is not made very well
customer_reviews.author: Faithe Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a bad tube. I have used this mascara for years! This tube was WAY too watered down. The color was lacking, it went on so sheer and wet eye lashes stuck together. They took forever to dry, then wiping them clean with a makeup wipe made it even worse. My lashes cracked and crumbled mascara down my face. Maybe not a reputable seller.
customer_reviews.author: Suvi

customer_reviews.title: Not clump free. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely NOT clump-free as advertised and therefore difficult to apply with satisfaction. Trying to "brush out" the clumps only seems to make things worse. I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: voila viola

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara as it isn’t gummy or clump in one area. It gives nice volume and coats the eyelashes evenly. It’s also easy to remove and gives a nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Elya N. Hillebrand

customer_reviews.title: Fairly Priced
customer_reviews.text: I got this hoping to find a cheaper "everyday" mascara so i could save my expensive one for special occasions... but this one let me down. Didnt give the volume and drama i strive for.
customer_reviews.author: michelle morales

customer_reviews.title: Flecks of mascara on my cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Tried this mascara out for two weeks. I did not like it. Black flakes would fall off my eyelashes and landed under my eyes within an hour. Removal was difficult, it would smudge under my eyes and took excessive force to wipe it off with a makeup removal towel. I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for a better mascara
customer_reviews.text: This formula is okay when you first apply it but it flakes off after a few hours and gives you that so sexy dark circle look if you sweat even the tiniest bit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikky

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage, great wand
customer_reviews.text: This mascara has the kind of wand I want which separates lashes to add definition. It also has good coverage to add volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lael Beckwith

customer_reviews.title: Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Great. But drys product as fall s on my skin a bit
customer_reviews.author: Lourds

customer_reviews.title: Good at the beginning, but does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it at the beginning after constantly spending around $50 for Expensive Brand mascara, but realized, it is still better to spend $50 once a year to have a great look, other than pay less and have trouble in a little time.... It got dry and and does not give effect it is advertised anymore (((
customer_reviews.author: Ilona

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage and no smudge, even with tears!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great coverage. Need to remove with waterproof remover, but that’s with most waterproof mascaras. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite mascara in the entire world. I have used it religiously since the 9th grade (and I have been out of school for a while now!) It gives you incredible length and definition without being clumpy or flaky.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lee Byrd

customer_reviews.title: favorite mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. I happen to have very short and not very full lashes; with the fibers in the mascara and the comb wand, you can create a long, full set of eyelashes by applying thin layers .
customer_reviews.author: Tyann M

customer_reviews.title: Mascara was dried up when I got it!
customer_reviews.text: I have always used this brand but mine came and it’s dried up. It looks old. Packaging looked fine tho. Will not order anymore. Will go buy it at a store from now on. What a waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Melanye wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, applies well, removes nicely
customer_reviews.text: I use a makeup remover to take this mascara off, but I can also get the job done with cleanser if I spend a little extra time. I like the consistency of this mascara, its flexibility once it dries on the lashes, the appearance of a more volume, and the deep brown-black color. On a blonde, its effective without being harsh, and I prefer it to black shades. Love the applicator, too -- spiky designs are my favorite. Later in the day, I sometimes notice a little mascara dust on my lower lids, but this doesn't bother me -- just brush it away.
customer_reviews.author: ElevenAndUp

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Bought this for my wedding day and have tested it out for a couple of days now. Goes on smoothly, stays on, no smudging during the day, and comes off very easily with makeup remover. Had it on while crying (bad day, haha) and it didn’t run!
customer_reviews.author: D. DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: 😍💜👍
customer_reviews.text: In love with this mascara, I've tried so many different mascaras and this one is by far my FAVORITE! Makes my lashes extra long
customer_reviews.author: FelichaTownsend

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: This works but it stinks! I haven't any that do before and I threw out the package before I could read the expiration date. I have worn it and nothing happened but I dont think I should put something so stinky near my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: nixsee

customer_reviews.title: Weird
customer_reviews.text: This is a weird product. Does not want to come off. From now on I will only buy mascara from a reputable store.
customer_reviews.author: Charlot

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mascara!
customer_reviews.text: Last all day, does not irritate my eyes like so many others.
customer_reviews.author: DJS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Omg I been using this for ever seriously, I but the $$$ ones and is not the same I always come back to L’Oréal love it
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely worthless I threw it away after trying twice. Must be old stock they bought and resold
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Voluminous Million Lashes Waterproof Mascara, Blackest Black, 0.32 Ounces
product_meta.description: Color:Waterproof Blackest Black| Size:Pack of 1L’Oral Paris Voluminous Million Lashes Waterproof Mascara creates amplified volume and definition. Our revolutionary collagen infused formula is buildable and amplifies each lash instantly. Glides on smoothly, and lasts all day, while thickening and separating every lash for a clump-free, smudge-free look. The Millionizer Brush is uniquely designed to separate lashes from corner to corner while building breathtaking volume. The built-in Clean Sweep Wiping System wipes the brush free of clumps leaving the perfect amount of mascara for an ultra-volumized clean lash look. This defining mascara contains a built-in Clean Sweep Wiping System that wipes the brush free of clumps leaving the perfect amount of mascara for an ultra-volumized clean lash look. Packing may vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site. • Lash by Lash Definition • Amplifying Millionizer brush • Collagen infused formula • Clump-free, Smudge proof, Waterproof mascara Place brush at base of lashes and gently sweep up to tip. Removes easily with waterproof eye makeup remover. Flammable until dry. Do not use near fire, flame or heat. To safeguard L’Oral purity, reserve this product for your personal use. Treat the applicator with the hygienic care you give your eyes. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle. Do not dilute mascara with water, saliva, or any other substance. Cap tightly after use. If change in odor or appearance occurs, discontinue use. Do not use this or any other eye cosmetic if your eye is injured, irritated or infected. Consult a physician.
feature_bullets: VOLUMINOUS MILLION LASHES MASCARA has a revolutionary collagen-infused formula & Millionizer Brush for amplified volume & definition. Fragrance-free. Ophthalmologist-tested & allergy-tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes & contact lens wearers.
L'OREAL MASCARA: Get the long, full eyelashes you love with our best mascaras & primers. Choose from our innovative volumizing formulas & variety of brushes.

CREATE YOUR PERFECT EYE MAKEUP LOOK with our collection of mascaras, achieve sleek lines with smudge-proof eyeliner, add definition to your brows & discover eyeshadow palettes with shades made for every eye color.

BECAUSE YOU'RE WORTH IT: L'Oréal Paris helps you create the look you want with our full line of makeup including foundations, concealers, highlighter makeup, eyeshadow palettes, lipsticks & much more.
PERECT TO PAIR WITH: L'Oréal Paris Voluminous Lash Primer. This lightweight eyelash primer builds dramatic volume & length on each lash for use under Voluminous mascara to instantly boost your look.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
